entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 20.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 near noon then light late this afternoon. High 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
